mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mm_meeting (name, begindate, enddate, deadline, remark, domain, creater, modifier) VALUES (#{name},#{begindate},#{enddate},#{deadline},#{remark},#{domain},#{creater},#{modifier})
mapper.update: UPDATE mm_meeting SET name = #{name}, begindate = #{begindate}, enddate = #{enddate}, deadline = #{deadline}, remark = #{remark}, modifier = #{modifier} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM mm_meeting WHERE 1 = 1
AND name LIKE concat('%',#{value},'%')
